title: Bright and beautiful 4 bedroom. Don't miss it! Won't last!
posting_body: Beautiful and bright 4 bedroom 1 bath apartment steps from Humboldt Park on Troy St near Wabansia.
Perfect for a family or roommates
Cats and dogs MAY be accepted depending on breed/size and history at prior rental.
Parking spot available in garage for $100/month.
Email for photos and with any questions
We are COVID-19 aware and conscious.
Our other tenants in the building are immunocompromised and we are taking every precaution to keep our community members safe.
